name: PantheraMan
effect_text: Deal 2 damage to a foe who has yet to go this round. If you are first to go this round or you have the highest Enthusiasm, draw 1 Pluck and gain 2 HP.

name: Flamebell
effect_text: Gain 2 HP, then all foes with a Power card(s) in their play and their Fighters take 1 damage.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or when this card is revealed, all Power cards gain damage minus 1 (damage dealt by those cards is reduced by 1 at the end of their resolutions).

name: Swift Guard!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe on your left or right. <1-5> No effect. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Damage you and your Fighter take this turn is reduced by 1. <12+> Deal 3 damage. Damage you and your Fighter take this turn is reduced by 1.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you are targeted for damage, resolve this Move in your play.

name: Formation of the Golden Wall!
effect_text: Gain 2 HP.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you are targeted for damage, your Fighter gains Block 1 (that card is revealed).

name: Battle Girl Alice
effect_text: This card gains Counter 1.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you defend with this card, Counter damage this card deals is treated as bypassing damage (once only).

name: Golden Wall
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or when this card is revealed, draw 1 card and this card gains 2 HP.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Deal 1 damage to a random foe each time you resolve a Staunch card or a Fighter defends this turn (excluding defending against this card’s effect).

name: Gold Frag
effect_text: Your Fighter(s) gains 1 HP when they are revealed.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you resolve the trigger effect of a Staunch card in your play, deal 2 damage to a random foe.

name: Double Wall Blowback!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foes on your left and right. <1-5> Deal 2 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 damage and if either target has a defending Fighter, deal 1 bypassing damage to them. <12+> Deal 3 damage and if either target has a defending Fighter, they both take 1 damage.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If this card is discarded from your hand or play,  your Fighter gains 2 HP (that card is revealed).

name: New Foundation
effect_text: <Trigger> If you resolve a trigger effect, gain 1 HP.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Gain 2 HP.

name: Hive
effect_text: Draw 1 Pluck and reveal it; apply the following effects based on the Pluck revealed: <Item> Add 1 Move or MAX VARIABLE from your hand to your play (MAX VARIABLE counts as an Move). <Event> Reset 1 of your Pluck. <Comeback> Add 1 Aura, Move or MAX VARIABLE from the discard pile to your hand.

name: Trance State!
effect_text: Discard up to 3 cards from your hand, then add 1 to your Focus for each card discarded. If you discarded 3 cards, resolve 1 of those discarded cards as if it was in your play.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If this card is discarded from your hand or play, deal 2 damage to a random foe.

name: Bolt Blossom
effect_text: Discard 1 card from your hand, then unfurl 4 cards. Add any Fighters with a class different to this card to your play and discard the other unfurled cards.

name: Sparking Rainbow Flower Frenzy!!!
effect_text: Target: Strongest foe. Add 1 to your Focus for each different class in your play. <1-5> Deal 1 damage for each class in your play. <6-11> Deal 2 damage for each class in your play. <12+> Deal 3 damage for each class in your play. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s).

name: Taxonomy Above All Orders
effect_text: Apply the following effects based on each different class in your play (you can only apply each effect once): <Staunch> Gain 2 HP and add 2 to your Focus. <Power> Deal 2 damage to a foe. <Unity> Reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time this round). <Canny> Gain 1 Comeback.

name: Side Step Counter!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe on your right. <1-5> Remove 1 reaction token from your Fighter. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Your Fighter gains Counter 1. <12+> Deal 2 bypassing damage. Your Fighter gains Counter 1.

name: Spinning Swallow Tail Deathblow!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe on your left. <1-5> Remove 2 reaction tokens from your Fighter. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Your Fighter gains Redirect 1. <12+> Deal 2 bypassing damage. Your Fighter gains Redirect 1.

name: Battle Girl Transformation!
effect_text: Resolve 1 of the following effects. If you have yet to deal damage this round, resolve 2 different effects instead: <> Your Fighter gains Counter 1. <> Take 2 damage, then your Fighter gains 2 HP. <> Draw 1 Pluck.

name: Double Combatants!
effect_text: Draw 1 card. If you have a Fighter in your play, it is now defending. Add 1 Fighter from your hand to your play.

name: Dual Wing Strike!!
effect_text: <Target> Your strongest foe. <1-5> Deal 2 damage. <6-11> Deal 2 damage. Draw 1 card. <12+> Deal 2 damage plus 1 additional damage for each card in your play past 4. Add 1 Unity card from the discard pile to your hand.

name: Jet and Climber
effect_text: Add 1 Move from your hand to your play. Draw 1 card and reveal it; if the card is a Move or MAX VARIABLE, add it to your play (MAX VARIABLE counts as a Move).

name: Dive Bomb Finisher!!!
effect_text: <Target> Your weakest foe. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. <12+> Deal 1 damage for each card in your play. Return 1 other card in your play to your hand.

name: Healing Backfire!!
effect_text: Deal 3 damage to a foe.
second_effect_text: <Trigger>  If you take damage, gain 2 HP and deal 3 damage to all foes with a Power card(s) in their play.

name: Thermodynamic Break!!!
effect_text: <Target> All foes with a larger hand than you (damage is calculated separately for each target). <1-5> Deal 3 damage. <6-11> Deal damage equal to the difference. Draw 1 card. <12+> Deal damage equal to the difference plus 2. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s). Draw 2 cards.

name: “Get Behind Me!”
effect_text: <Trigger> If you are targeted for damage and your Fighter has 3 or less HP, add 1 card from your hand to your play. The added card takes the damage instead (this does not count as defending). If the card added was a Staunch Fighter, resolve its main effect.

name: MAX VARIABLE
effect_text: Unfurl 4 cards (reveal 4 cards from the top of the Main deck). Add 1 card that matches the type MAX VARIABLE is replacing to your play and add 2 of the other unfurled cards to your hand. Discard MAX VARIABLE and the last unfurled card.

name: MAX VARIABLE #2
effect_text: Unfurl 2 cards (reveal 2 cards from the top of the Main deck). Add 1 to your play and discard the other. If the added card matches the type MAX VARIABLE is replacing, draw 1 Pluck. Discard MAX VARIABLE.

name: "MAX VARIABLE!!"
effect_text: Discard 2 cards from your hand; add MAX VARIABLEs from the discard pile to your play until you have 4 cards in your play (max of 2). If all cards in your play are MAX VARIABLE, draw 1 Pluck and add 4 to your Focus.

name: Max Variable’s Variable Box
effect_text: Once per round, if a MAX VARIABLE(s) in any play resolves, roll a die and apply 1 of the following effects based on the result:<1> Gain 1 HP. <2-3> 1 random card in your play gains damage plus 1. <4-5> Discard 1 card from your hand; draw 1 Pluck. <6> Deal 2 damage to all foes, then discard this Item. Discard this Item after the fourth round of use.

name: Boisterous Call!
effect_text: Gain 1 HP and add 4 to your Focus.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, add 4 to your Enthusiasm and resolve this Aura in your play.

name: Feasting Claw!!
effect_text: Deal 2 damage to a foe and gain 1 HP. If you are first to go this round or have the highest Enthusiasm, deal 2 additional damage and gain 1 HP.

name: Black Claw Divide!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe who has yet to go this round. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. <12+> Deal 4 piercing damage. The next player's Move(s) and Ending(s) gain damage minus 1 (damage dealt by those cards is reduced by 1 at the end of their resolutions).

name: Black Note
effect_text: All players and their Fighters take 1 damage. Add 3 to your Focus.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or when this card is revealed, damage you and this card take is reduced by 1.

name: Debilitating Sound!
effect_text: All players discard 1 Move from their play. If your play did not have a Move before the resolution of this card's effect, resolve 1 of the discarded Moves as this card's effect.

name: Super Sonic Riff!!
effect_text: Deal 3 damage to a random foe and you take 2 damage.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, resolve this Move in your play, then discard it.

name: Max Reverb!!!
effect_text: <Target> All foes. If you are at 8 HP or less, add 3 to your Focus. <1-5> Deal 2 piercing damage. Take 4 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. Take 3 damage. <12+> Deal 4 piercing damage and ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s). Take 2 damage.

name: Gravity Enforcer
effect_text: Foes with Enthusiasm lower than yours can not use reactions. Deal 2 damage to the foe with the lowest Enthusiasm.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or when this card is revealed, lower the Enthusiasm of all foes by 4.

name: Heavy Aura!
effect_text: All foes with Enthusiasm lower than yours take 1 damage after resolving the effect of their Move(s).
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, lower the Enthusiasm of all foes by 4.

name: Heavy Radius!!
effect_text: Trigger effects can not be used in response to this card. Deal 3 damage to a foe with Enthusiasm lower than yours. They can not use Items or trigger effects during the next player's turn.

name: Infinity Mass Press!!!
effect_text: Reduce the Focus of all foes by 3.
second_effect_text: <Target> Foe with Enthusiasm lower than yours. <1-5> No effect. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. <12+> Deal damage equal to the difference (max of 6).

name: Super Panther Claw
effect_text: <Limited> Gain 2 HP.
second_effect_text: Discard this item; deal 2 piercing damage to a foe who has yet to go this round.

name: A Hero’s Entrance
effect_text: Your Fighter(s) gains damage plus 1 if it deals damage to a defending Fighter (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution).
second_effect_text: <C.Trigger> At the start of the round, you go first.

name: Rallying Cry
effect_text: This Comeback counts as a Staunch card in your play (this does not count towards play size).
second_effect_text: <C.Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe’s turn, add 8 to your Enthusiasm.

name: Experimental Dual Mode Thruster
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, discard 1 card from your hand; resolve one of the following effects: <> Add 3 to your Focus this round. <> Add 3 to your Enthusiasm this round.
second_effect_text: Discard this Item after the third round of use.

name: Project HERMES
effect_text: Add 1 of the following from their respective discard piles to your hand/ownership: <>Up to 2 cards and 1 Pluck in the Project series except Project HERMES. <>2 Unity cards. <>1 MAX VARIABLE and 1 Item.

name: The Survey Crew
effect_text: This Comeback counts as a Unity card in your play (this does not count towards play size).
second_effect_text: <Critical> Return 1 card from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck.

name: Earplugs
effect_text: <Limited> Add 3 to your Focus.
second_effect_text: Once per round, if you or your defending Fighter would take damage from a reaction or self inflicted damage, reduce that damage by 2.

effect_text: All players discard cards from their plays until they have 3 or less cards, then deal 2 damage to all players that discarded card(s) from their play.
second_effect_text: <Critical> All foes and their Fighters take 1 damage.

name: Tuning
effect_text: This Comeback counts as a Canny card in your play (this does not count towards play size).
second_effect_text: <Critical> Add 3 to your Focus.

name: Gravity Patrol Badge
effect_text: <L.Trigger> During a foe's turn, card effects can not be resolved more than once this round.
second_effect_text: Lower the Enthusiasm of all foes by 2.

name: Ground Collapse
effect_text: All foes take 1 damage each time they resolve a trigger effect as long as they have Enthusiasm lower than yours.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, lower the Enthusiasm of all foes by 2, then resolve this Event in your ownership.

name: New Equilibrium
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe's turn, lower the Enthusiasm of all foes by 2.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Your Ending gains damage plus 1 if it deals damage to a foe with Enthusiasm lower than yours.

name: The Star-Cat Alliance
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of a round, gain 1 HP and add 2 to your Enthusiasm.
second_effect_text: <Critical> The foe with the lowest enthusiasm discards 2 cards from their hand.

name: Old Playbook
effect_text: <Limited> This Item counts as a Canny card in your play this round (this does not count towards play size).

name: Off Duty
effect_text: Players can not use the effects of Fighters or reactions. You can not resolve this Event if you defended with a Fighter, resolved the effects of a Fighter(s) or used a reaction(s) this round.

name: Ceifeira Preta
effect_text: Resolve 1 of the following effects: <> Gain 1 Comeback and add 1 Fighter from the discard pile to your hand. <> Discard 2 Comebacks in your ownership; return 3 cards from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck in any order.

name: Life Cleaving Presence!
effect_text: Gain 1 Comeback. Discard 1 card from your strongest or weakest foe's hand  for each Comeback in your ownership (max of 3), then they draw 1 card for each Comeback in their ownership plus 1 (max of 3).

name: Reaping Dive!!
effect_text: Take 2 damage, then resolve 1 Comeback in your ownership one more time as if you were at critical HP.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If a card(s) is discarded from your hand or play, gain 1 Comeback and resolve this Move in your play.

name: Psychopomp Chop!!!
effect_text: <Target> Your strongest or weakest foe. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. Gain 1 Comeback. <12+> Deal 3 damage. Gain 2 Comebacks, then resolve 1 of your Comebacks as if you were at critical HP.

name: Portal
effect_text:
Portal                 


Deal 2 bypassing damage to a foe. If you have a Unity card in your play, deal 1 bypassing damage to a random foe.

name: Teleporting Mastery!
effect_text: Discard 1 Aura, Move or Ending in a foe's play, then that foe adds 1 random card matching the removed card's type or MAX VARIABLE from their hand to their play (the new card is revealed).
second_effect_text: <Trigger> During a foe's turn, resolve this Aura in your play.

name: Distant Drop-off!!!
effect_text: <Target> Random foe. If you have a Unity card in your play, add 3 to your focus. <1-5> Deal 3 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. Discard 1 card from their hand. <12+> Deal 3 damage. They discard 1 card from their play.

name: Spatial Reversal!!
effect_text: This card copies the text of a foe's Move on your left or right until the end of your turn (if their Move is face-down, reveal it).
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you are targeted for damage, your Fighter gains Redirect 1 (that card is revealed).

name: Spirit Channeling and Union!
effect_text: <Target> You. <1-5> Draw 1 Pluck, then discard 1 Pluck. <6-11> Draw 1 Pluck. <12+> Gain 1 Event and 2 HP.

name: Umala - Heavy Trampling!!
effect_text: Draw 1 Pluck. Deal 1 piercing damage for each Event in your ownership (max of 4) to a random foe, then gain 2 HP.

name: Bone Whisperer
effect_text: Resolve 1 of the following effects: <> Discard up to 3 cards from your hand; gain 1 HP for each card discarded. <>Discard 3 cards from your hand; unfurl 3 Pluck (reveal 3 cards from the top of the Pluck deck). Add 2 Pluck to your ownership and discard the other unfurled Pluck.

name: Pitch - Swift Rending!!!
effect_text: <Target> Random foe. <1-5> No effect. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. Add 1 Event from the discard pile to your ownership. <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Add 1 card and 1 Event from their respective discard piles to your hand/ownership.

name: Restorative Heat!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe of your choice. All foes with a Power card(s) in their play take 1 damage. <1-5> Deal 2 damage. Gain 2 HP. <6-11> Deal 3 damage. Gain 2 HP. <12+> Deal 4 damage. Gain 2 HP and resolve your Aura one more time.

name: Warm Mending!
effect_text: Add 1 card from the discard pile to your hand. If the card added was Staunch or Power, gain 2 HP and add 1 Aura from the discard pile to your hand.

name: New Growth
effect_text: Add 2 to the Focus of the next card in your play.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Add the top card of the Main deck to your play.

name: Grimmer Form
effect_text: <Trigger> If you are targeted for damage, apply each of the following effects for each Comeback in your ownership: <1> Your Fighter is treated as Canny. <2> Discard 1 card in your strongest or weakest foe's hand. <3> You can discard 1 card in your play; you are unaffected by the effect(s) of the card targeting you. <4+> Your next Move and next Ending gain damage plus 1.

name: Blast Mouth
effect_text:
Deal 2 damage to a foe who has already gone this round. 
 
If you are last to go this round or have the lowest Enthusiasm, deal 2 additional damage and draw 1 Pluck.

name: Electric Powered Wildflowers!
effect_text: Add 1 random card from your hand to your play. Add 2 to your Focus.

name: Mirror Plant!!
effect_text: Resolve 1 of the following effects: <> This card copies the text of your Aura. <> Return 2 cards from your hand to the top of the Main deck in any order; resolve your Fighter and reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time this round).

name: Precious Potted Plant
effect_text: <Limited> Place 1 card from your hand under this Item (if this Item is discarded or changes ownership, the placed card(s) is discarded).
second_effect_text: This Item counts as the class of the card(s) under it in each of your plays (this does not count towards play size).

name: Change of Plans
effect_text: <Trigger> During a foe's turn; switch 1 card in your play that has yet to be resolved with 1 card in your hand of the same type (the new card can not be used to defend).
second_effect_text: <Critical> Discard 1 card from your hand; add 1 MAX VARIABLE from your hand to your play (MAX VARIABLE counts as an Aura).

name: "Hau, Scout Ahead!"
effect_text:
Add 3 to your Focus and reset 1 of your Pluck.
Discard up to 2 Pluck in your ownership; select an equal number of foes. Look at their hand(s) and all cards in their play(s), then discard 1 card from their hand(s).

name: Spirit Anchor
effect_text: <Limited> If you resolve an Event this round, place the Event under this Item instead of discarding it at the end of the round (the placed Event(s) count towards your Pluck limit, and if this Item is discarded or changes ownership, the placed Event(s) is discarded).
second_effect_text: The Event(s) under this Item can be resolved one more time; the Event is not discarded at the end of the round.

name: Reconnection
effect_text: Discard 2 cards from your hand; gain 1 Event.
second_effect_text: <Limited> Draw 1 Pluck and you can resolve one additional Event this round.

name: Muertorn the Soul Returning Scythe
effect_text: Once per round, if you gain a Comeback(s), add 1 Fighter from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If a card(s) in your play is discarded before resolving its main effect, discard this Item; resolve that card (max of 1) as if it was in your play.

name: Returning Souls
effect_text: Add 2 Comebacks from the discard pile to your ownership. You can not resolve them this round.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Discard 2 cards from your play; add 1 Aura from the discard pile to your play.

name: Burst Esper
effect_text: Deal 2 damage to a random foe and add 2 to your Focus. That foe draws 2 cards. You can resolve this effect one more time.

name: Mass Conversion and Release!!
effect_text: Discard up to 3 cards from your hand, then deal 1 damage to 2 random foes for each card discarded. If you discarded 3 cards, ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s).
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If this card is discarded from your hand or play, deal 2 damage to a random foe.

name: Power Channeling Unit
effect_text: <Limited> Return 1 card from the discard pile to your hand.
second_effect_text: Once per round, if a card in your play or ownership randomly chooses a foe(s) or card(s) at, you choose the target(s) instead.

name: Testing
effect_text: Select 1 card in your play (that card is revealed), then unfurl 5 cards. Add all cards matching that card's class or MAX VARIABLE(s) to your hand, then return the other unfurled cards to the top or bottom of the Main deck in any order.

name: Transfer of Bad Energy
effect_text: Discard 1 card from your hand; 1 random card in your play gains damage plus 1 (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution).
second_effect_text: <C.Trigger> At the start of the round, your Fighter gains Redirect 1 (that card is revealed).

name: Healing Fire
effect_text: Each time you resolve the effect of an Aura, gain 1 HP.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If your Fighter would be defeated or removed from your play, discard this Item; your Fighter gains Endure 1 (that card is revealed).

name: Supernova
effect_text: All foes with a Power card(s) in their play take 1 damage. All Fighters are treated as Power and all effects that increase damage are cancelled.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or if you are targeted for damage, resolve this Event in your ownership.

name: Rekindled
effect_text: Gain 2 HP.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Resolve your Aura one more time.

name: Red Fist
effect_text: Deal 3 damage to your strongest foe, then discard 2 cards from your hand.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> Just before using this card’s reaction(s), remove 2 Counter tokens from this card; draw 3 cards.

name: Hammerspace
effect_text:
Draw 1 card and gain 1 Item. 
If you have a Canny card in your play, reset 1 of your Pluck (you can resolve the extra effects of 1 Pluck one more time this round).

name: Ignition Left!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe on your left. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s) and draw 1 card.

name: Big Bang Right!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe on your right. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. Discard 1 card from your hand. <6-11> Deal 1 piercing damage. <12+> Deal 6 piercing damage. Ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s) and draw 1 card.

name: Double Ki Charge!
effect_text: Add 2 to your Focus and your next Move gains damage plus 1 (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution). You can discard 1 Aura from your hand to resolve this effect one more time.

name: Berserk Transformation!
effect_text: Deal 2 damage to a random foe and add 2 to your Focus. If you are last to go this round, the next card in your play gains damage plus 1 (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution).

name: Cinder Crunch!!
effect_text: Deal 3 piercing damage to a foe who has already gone this round. If this card defeats a Fighter, your Ending gains damage plus 1 (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution).

name: Burning Impact!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe of your choice. If you are last to go this round, ignore the reaction(s) of defending Fighter(s). <1-5> Deal 4 damage. <6-11> Deal 4 piercing damage. <12+> Deal 5 piercing damage and 1 additional piercing damage if they have already gone this round.

name: Revenge Swipe
effect_text: Take 2 damage, then deal 2 damage to a foe.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Deal 2 piercing damage to a foe.

name: Reptilian Super Serum
effect_text: Once per round, you can take 2 damage, then your Fighter gains damage plus 1 and is treated as Power for the rest of your turn (that card deals 1 additional damage at the end of its resolution).

name: Reverting to Normal
effect_text: Add 1 Fighter from the discard pile to your hand.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If your Fighter would be defeated, return it to your hand instead and add a Fighter with a different class from your hand to your play (this does not count as a defeat; you can not defend with another card this round).

name: Extra-Dexterous Non-Combat Arms
effect_text: If you have a Power Fighter in your play and you discard a card(s) from your hand, you can draw 1 card.
second_effect_text: Discard this Item after the third round of use.

name: Bull in a China Shop
effect_text: Draw 3 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or during a player’s turn, deal 1 damage to a random foe each time a card(s) is discarded from your hand or removed from your play this round.

name: Peaceful Meditation
effect_text: This Comeback counts as a Power card in your play (this does not count towards play size).
second_effect_text: <Trigger> Draw 3 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Reunion
effect_text: <Trigger> During a foe’s turn, discard 2 cards from your hand; gain 2 HP.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Add 1 Staunch card and 1 Power card from the discard pile to your hand.

name: Strength Training Manual
effect_text: <Limited> This Item counts as a Power card in your play this round (this does not count towards play size).

name: First Aid Kit
effect_text: <Limited> This Item counts as a Staunch card in your play this round (this does not count towards play size).

name: “More Training!”
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe's turn, your Fighter gains 1 HP (that card is revealed).
second_effect_text: <C.Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe's turn, your Fighter gains Counter 1 (that card is revealed).

name: “Battle Greaves!”
effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round or during a foe's turn, your Fighter gains Counter 1 (that card is revealed).
second_effect_text: Once per foe's turn, if you have a defending Power Fighter and you are dealt damage, reduce that damage by 1.

name: Menacingly Cute Pose
effect_text: Foes can not use trigger effects or reactions in response to the effects and reactions of your Fighter(s).

name: Clustering!
effect_text: Your next Move targets the foes on your left and right instead for its first resolution.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, discard this Aura in your play; draw 2 cards.

name: Collection Swarm!!
effect_text: Deal 3 damage to a foe, then steal 1 of their Items. Discard the Item at the end of the round or when this card is removed from your play.

name: Stinger Tornado!!!
effect_text: <Target> 2 foes on your right. <1-5> Deal 1 damage. <6-11> Deal 3 piercing damage. Draw 1 card. <12+> Deal 3 piercing damage. Draw 1 card and resolve 1 random card in your play one more time.

name: Self Replicating Mechanical Bees
effect_text: <Limited> Deal 1 piercing damage to a random foe.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> If you draw a card(s) or Pluck, gain 1 HP.

name: Bug in a Cup
effect_text: <Trigger> If a foe adds a card(s) to their play, add that card (max of 1) to your play instead and they draw 2 cards. Discard the added card after its resolution.

name: Robbing
effect_text: Draw 2 cards, then 2 random foes draw 1 card.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Steal 1 Pluck from a foe, then they draw 2 cards. Discard the Pluck at the end of your turn or when this Comeback is removed from your ownership.

name: Personal Pocket Dimension!
effect_text: Unfurl cards equal to the number of different classes in your play or equal to the number of Items in your ownership (max of 3). Add any Auras or Moves to your play and discard the other unfurled cards.

name: ...And The Kitchen Sink!!
effect_text: Deal 2 damage to a foe. If you have 4 or more Items in your ownership, deal 2 additional damage.
second_effect_text: <Trigger> At the start of the round, discard this Move in your play; draw 1 Pluck.

name: Super Heavyweight Drop!!!
effect_text: <Target> Foe of your choice. If you have a Canny card in your play, add 3 to your focus. <1-5> Deal 3 damage and they gain 1 Item. Gain 1 Item. <6-11> Deal 4 damage and they draw 1 Pluck. Gain 1 Item. <12+> Deal 5 damage. Gain 1 Item or add 1 Item from the discard pile to your ownership.

name: Infinite Storage Space
effect_text: <Limited> Draw 1 Pluck.

name: “Port!”
effect_text: Unfurl 3 cards; add 1 Warp Family series card and 1 Canny card to your hand. Discard the other unfurled cards.
second_effect_text: Add 1 random Warp Family series card or random 1 Canny card from your hand to your play.

name: Entering the Inventory
effect_text: Discard 1 card from your hand, then unfurl 2 Pluck. Add 1 Pluck to your ownership and discard the other unfurled Pluck.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Draw 1 card and gain 1 Item.

name: An Opening to Their Blindspot
effect_text: Once per round, deal 1 bypassing damage to a foe. If you have a Canny Fighter in your play, you can resolve this Item one more time.

name: “Hammer!”
effect_text: Unfurl 3 cards; add 1 Warp Family series card and 1 Unity card to your hand. Discard the other unfurled cards.
second_effect_text: Add 1 random Warp Family series card or 1 random Unity card from your hand to your play.

name: Backdoor Exit
effect_text: <Trigger> If a card(s) in your play would be sent to the discard pile during this round, return that card (max of 1) to your hand instead.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Discard 1 card from 2 random foes' hands.

name: Swiss Army Knife
effect_text: <Limited> This Item counts as a Unity card in your play this round (this does not count towards play size).

name: Surprise Appearance
effect_text: Unfurl 3 cards; add 1 card to your hand and discard the other unfurled cards. Apply the following effects based on the classes of the added card (you can only apply each effect once): <Power> Deal 1 damage to a foe and add 3 to your Focus. <Unity> Return 1 Aura or 1 Move from the discard pile to the top of the Main deck. <Canny> Deal 2 bypassing damage to a foe.

name: The Next Project
effect_text: Discard 1 card from your hand; discard 1 Item in a random foe’s ownership.
second_effect_text: <Critical> Add 1 Item from the discard pile to your ownership.
